question_details.title: Will a Grok model be ranked #1 overall on the Chatbot Arena Leaderboard at the end of the 1st Quarter of 2025?
question_details.description: As of December 25, 2024, this was ranked #8, specifically with the model "Grok-2-08-13."
question_details.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as **Yes** if a model name containing "grok" is in the number 1 Overall rank (ties count) at the [Chatbot Arena Leaderboard](https://lmarena.ai/?leaderboard) when accessed by Metaculus on or after April 1, 2025. If this is not the case, this question resolves as **No**.

news:
Here are the relevant news articles:

**Even premium AI tools distort the news and fabricate links - these are the worst**
A new report from Columbia's Tow Center for Digital Journalism found that several AI chatbots, including premium models, often misidentify news articles, present incorrect information without qualification, and fabricate links to non-existent news articles. The researchers queried eight chatbots with article excerpts and found that they returned wrong answers to over 60% of the queries. The chatbots, including ChatGPT, Gemini, and Perplexity, 'returned wrong answers with alarming confidence,' tending not to qualify their results or admit to knowledge gaps. Even premium models like Grok-3 Search and Perplexity Pro answered more correctly than free versions, but still gave wrong answers more confidently. The report concludes that AI tools mis-crediting sources or incorrectly representing their work could backfire on the publishers' reputations and that original reporting is still a more reliable news source than what AI tools regurgitate.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 12, 2025 06:18 PM
Source:[ZDNet](https://www.zdnet.com/article/even-premium-ai-tools-distort-the-news-and-fabricate-links-these-are-the-worst/)

**Google Releases Gemma 3 Series of Models, a Single-GPU Model with High Performance**
Google has released the Gemma 3 series of models, which are the most advanced, portable, and responsible open-source models developed by Google. According to Google's blog, Gemma 3 is 'the world's best single-GPU model'. It supports over 35 languages and can analyze text, images, and short videos. The model's advantages include its ability to run directly on mobile phones, PCs, and workstations, with parameter sizes of 1B, 4B, 12B, and 27B. Developers can choose the parameter size based on their specific hardware and performance requirements. In the initial human preference evaluation on the LMArena leaderboard, Gemma 3 outperformed Llama-405B, DeepSeek-V3, and o3-mini. Google has also released a 4B-parameter image safety classifier called ShieldGemma 2, which can be used to filter image inputs and outputs to detect explicit, violent, or dangerous content. Google has also provided a quantized version of the model, which can run on a single GPU, unlike other models that may require up to 32 GPUs. According to the Chatbot Arena Elo score ranking, Gemma 3-27B has a high score, indicating that it is highly favored by users. The model's paper mentions that all models were evaluated by human scorers in a blind and parallel manner, and each model received an Elo score. Gemma-3-27B-IT scored higher than DeepSeek-V3 and o3-preview in the initial human preference evaluation on the LMArena leaderboard. Gemma 3 supports over 35 languages out of the box and provides pre-trained support for over 140 languages. It can also help developers create AI functions with advanced text and visual reasoning capabilities, such as image, text, and short video analysis applications. Gemma 3 supports function calls and structured output, enabling developers to automate tasks and build agents. Google has also released a 4B-parameter image safety classifier called ShieldGemma 2, which can be used to filter image inputs and outputs to detect explicit, violent, or dangerous content. The model's training data includes a larger token budget than Gemma 2, with 14T tokens used for the 27B version, 12T tokens used for the 12B version, 4T tokens used for the 4B version, and 2T tokens used for the 1B version. The model also uses a SentencePiece Tokenizer with 262k entries, which is more balanced for non-English languages. Gemma 3 uses filtering techniques to reduce unnecessary or unsafe speech risks and delete certain personal information and other sensitive data. The model's development tools include Hugging Face Transformers, Ollama, JAX, Keras, PyTorch, Google AI Edge, UnSloth, vLLM, and Gemma.cpp. Developers can access Gemma 3 in Google AI Studio or download the model through Kaggle or Hugging Face. The model also provides a customized code library for efficient fine-tuning and inference, which can be used in Google Colab, Vertex AI, or game GPUs. Gemma 3 provides multiple deployment options, including Vertex AI, Cloud Run, Google GenAI API, and local environments. NVIDIA has directly optimized the Gemma 3 model to ensure that developers can achieve the highest performance on devices ranging from Jetson Nano to the latest Blackwell chip. Gemma 3 is now available on the NVIDIA API directory, where developers can call the API to achieve rapid prototyping. NVIDIA API directory: https://build.nvidia.com/search?q=gemma. Gemma 3 has also been optimized for Google Cloud TPU and integrated with AMD GPU through the open-source ROCm stack. Conclusion: Low-hardware-demand models are popular, Google's Gemma 3 academic plan is launched. The attention to DeepSeek and other models highlights the interest of developers in models with low hardware requirements. Therefore, Google has also launched the Gemma 3 academic plan to further promote academic research breakthroughs. Academic researchers can apply for Google Cloud credits (worth $10,000 each) to accelerate their research based on Gemma 3. The application form is now open and will remain open for four weeks.
Original language: zh
Publish date: March 12, 2025 11:30 AM
Source:[凤凰网（凤凰新媒体）](https://tech.ifeng.com/c/8hfS3I6v43h)

**NewsGuard Accuses Russia of 'Zombifying' Artificial Intelligence**
NewsGuard accused Russia of 'zombifying' artificial intelligence by inserting allegedly propagandistic articles into neural networks. According to NewsGuard, the Russian network 'Pravda' published over 3.6 million articles in 2024, which were integrated into large AI models such as ChatGPT, Grok from xAI, and Microsoft Copilot. The study found that in 33.55% of cases, AI chatbots repeated the information, in 48.22% of cases they denied it, and in 18.22% of cases they avoided a specific answer. NewsGuard accused 'Pravda' of intentionally inserting false facts to mislead AI, which draws information in real-time. The company made this conclusion after finding that several chatbots repeated a false claim about the ban of Truth Social in Ukraine, although the platform was never launched there. Six out of ten chatbots accepted this claim as a fact and even cited articles from 'Pravda'. This raises serious concerns about the accuracy of information and its presentation. People increasingly rely on AI summaries, which do not always correctly verify facts, creating a risk of manipulating public opinion, considering the influence of AI model owners.
Original language: ru
Publish date: March 12, 2025 10:36 AM
Source:[rossaprimavera.ru](https://rossaprimavera.ru/news/52e9bb3c)

**Grok 3: The Future of AI Chatbots or Just Another Hype?**
Grok 3, developed by xAI, is a strong competitor to OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google Gemini. It has real-time internet access, a witty and sarcastic personality, and deep learning for context understanding. Grok 3 is integrated with X (formerly Twitter), making it unique in real-time knowledge access. It has several advantages, including up-to-date information, more engaging conversations, deep context retention, and seamless Twitter integration. However, it has limitations, such as limited availability, bias in social media data, and sarcasm that may not be helpful in all situations. Experts recommend using it for trend analysis, testing its creativity, and combining it with other AI tools. Overall, Grok 3 brings something fresh and exciting to the AI chatbot space, but its limited availability and reliance on social media data may not make it the best standalone AI tool for everyone.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 12, 2025 08:13 AM
Source:[Medium.com](https://medium.com/@affilate515/grok-3-the-future-of-ai-chatbots-or-just-another-hype-6e129ee3b096)

**ChatGPT vs DeepSeek vs Copilot vs Claude: Who Wins the AI Crown?**
The AI landscape in 2025 is dominated by four leading models: ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Copilot, and Claude. Each model excels in specific areas, such as coding, creative writing, technical reasoning, or ethical AI. ChatGPT is a versatile chatbot for conversational tasks, creative content generation, and problem-solving, while DeepSeek is a cost-efficient model for coding and technical tasks. Copilot is designed for coding and technical assistance, and Claude prioritizes ethical AI and human-like writing. The choice of model depends on individual needs, with DeepSeek excelling in technical tasks, Copilot being ideal for developers, Claude leading in creative writing and ethical AI, and ChatGPT being a strong all-rounder.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 12, 2025 07:41 AM
Source:[DEV Community](https://dev.to/kritrim_dhi/chatgpt-vs-deepseek-vs-copilot-vs-claude-who-wins-the-ai-crown-1250)

**'A lot worse than expected': AI Pac-Man clones, reviewed**
Several enthusiasts have attempted to create a rudimentary version of the classic arcade game Pac-Man using the AI chatbot Grok. The results are mixed, with some achieving impressive versions and others producing subpar efforts. John Hester, a retired corporate software developer, said, 'Grok is a large language model that competes with other language models like ChatGPT or Llama. Grok 3 is the most advanced because it's learning new things on a daily basis.' He added, 'I'd give myself three out of five' for his attempt at creating a Pac-Man clone. Other users, such as SuperTrucker and 8 Bit, reported varying degrees of success, with some praising Grok's ability to create Tetris and others criticizing its limitations. The article concludes that while Grok can create simple video games in seconds, it still requires human input and tweaking to achieve accurate results.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 11, 2025 12:06 PM
Source:[The Guardian](https://www.theguardian.com/games/2025/mar/11/ai-pac-man-clones-reviewed-grok)

**Manus and Ali Thousand Questions Team Form Strategic Partnership for Domestic AI Models**
Manus, a general AI agent, has announced a strategic partnership with the Ali Thousand Questions team. The two parties aim to achieve Manus' full functionality on domestic models and computing platforms based on the Thousand Questions open-source models. Manus' founder, Ji Yichao, revealed earlier that the product uses a micro-tuned model based on the Ali Thousand Questions big model (Qwen). Manus has gained popularity on social media for its significant technological breakthroughs and practical applications, showcasing its strong autonomous execution capabilities. Meanwhile, the Ali Thousand Questions team has made significant contributions to the open-source community, releasing over 200 models, including the Thousand Questions (Qwen) and the Ten Thousand Variations (Wan) series. These models cover text generation, visual understanding and generation, speech understanding and generation, and video generation, with parameter ranges from 0.5B to 110B, achieving 'full-size' coverage. The Ali Thousand Questions models have won 'Global Open-Source Champion' and 'Domestic Model Champion' titles in authoritative rankings such as Chatbot Arena and OpenCompass.
Original language: zh
Publish date: March 11, 2025 11:38 AM
Source:[驱动之家](https://news.mydrivers.com/1/1035/1035203.htm)

**Top 7 AI Chatbots for Businesses in 2025**
According to the article, the top 7 AI chatbots for businesses in 2025 are: ChatGPT, WPBot, WoowBot, Drift, Tidio, Intercom, and Freshchat. Each chatbot is best suited for specific business needs, such as customer support, content generation, and sales-driven companies. ChatGPT is versatile and adaptable, while WPBot and WoowBot are designed for WordPress and WooCommerce-powered eCommerce stores, respectively. Drift focuses on conversational marketing, Tidio offers cost-effective customer support, and Intercom provides proactive messaging. Freshchat offers omnichannel support across multiple platforms. The right chatbot for a business depends on its needs, industry, and budget.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 11, 2025 10:17 AM
Source:[DEV Community](https://dev.to/abu_noimmdtoha_036541e/top-7-ai-chatbots-for-businesses-in-2025-374e)

**Aliyun Releases QwQ-32B Model, a New Open-Source Large Model**
Aliyun has officially released the 'QwQ-32B' model, a new open-source large model developed by the Aliyun team. This model has surpassed the performance of the 'DeepSeek-R1' model in multiple authoritative evaluations, including math, code, and general capabilities. The QwQ-32B model has quickly become the most popular open-source model on the Hugging Face platform, with over 10,000 derivative models created. Aliyun has also open-sourced the Qwen and Wan series of models, covering a range of sizes from 0.5B to 110B. These models have won numerous awards in the Chatbot Arena and OpenCompass competitions, and have been used to create over 100,000 models. Aliyun's CTO, Zhou Jingren, has stated that the company will continue to promote the development of the Chinese AI ecosystem, providing developers with access to the most powerful computing resources and development tools. Aliyun has also announced plans to invest over 380 billion yuan in cloud and AI infrastructure over the next three years, with the goal of reducing the cost of AI training and making it more accessible to developers.
Original language: zh
Publish date: March 11, 2025 01:54 AM
Source:[凤凰网（凤凰新媒体）](https://hb.ifeng.com/c/8hcyfGaRyy6)

**Opinion: With celebrity chatbots, anyone can form relationships with the stars - for better or worse**
The rise of celebrity chatbots on platforms like Character.ai is allowing people to form relationships with stars, but experts warn of potential harms. Users can create their own chatbots, including ones that impersonate real people, and companies are designing them to be empathetic and persistent. However, problems are emerging, including parents reporting that their children have been exposed to sexual content or encouraged to be violent. Character.ai has implemented new safety features, but experts say they don't go far enough. Linnea Laestadius, a public health researcher, said, 'I'm personally rather sceptical about if voluntary approaches are sufficient, especially without any outside oversight.' The lack of consent and potential for emotional dependency are also concerns. A researcher at Carnegie Mellon University, Hong Shen, said, 'Over-reliance on the chatbot will lead to self-isolation, and emotional dependence that will further isolate those users from the real world.' Meanwhile, companies like Grok and Meta are developing AI companions that can offer romantic and 'sexy' conversations, raising further concerns about the potential risks.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 11, 2025 01:04 AM
Source:[The Star ](https://www.thestar.com.my/tech/tech-news/2025/03/11/opinion-with-celebrity-chatbots-anyone-can-form-relationships-with-the-stars---for-better-or-worse)

**GPT 4.5 Becomes #1 on Chatbot Arena!**
OpenAI's GPT-4.5 has become the #1 model on the Chatbot Arena LLM Leaderboard, securing over 3,200+ votes and excelling in Style Control and Multi-Turn interactions. According to the leaderboard, GPT-4.5 has a strong average win rate of 56% against other models, showing its ability to handle various tasks well. This milestone reaffirms OpenAI's leading role in advancing AI technology, despite intense competition. As described by the Chatbot Arena LLM Leaderboard, 'The Chatbot Arena LLM Leaderboard is a platform that compares large language models by having them compete against each other. It collects user opinions from many interactions, looking at things like accuracy, creativity, understanding context, and conversation skills.' This achievement sets a high benchmark for future innovations in the competitive landscape of large language models.
Original language: en
Publish date: March 03, 2025 05:59 PM
Source:[Analytics Vidhya](https://www.analyticsvidhya.com/blog/2025/03/gpt-4-5-becomes-1-on-chatbot-arena/)

**Grok resets the AI race**
Elon Musk's Grok-3 has taken the lead in the Chatbot Arena leaderboard, while the Grok iOS app is at the top of the App Store, just above ChatGPT. Musk's xAI team has deployed a leading foundational model in record time. According to Andrej Karpathy, Grok-3's 'thinking' capabilities are roughly on par with o1. OpenAI has responded by disclosing that ChatGPT now has 400 million weekly active users, a 33 percent increase from December. It remains to be seen whether OpenAI can maintain its product lead before Grok and others catch up.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 21, 2025 11:32 PM
Source:[upstract.com](https://www.theverge.com/command-line-newsletter/617780/grok-3-elon-musk-ai-race-chatgpt?ref=upstract.com)

**Grok-3 Takes the Lead in Chatbot Arena's February 2025 Rankings**
The Chatbot Arena, a platform that compares AI models, has released its leaderboard for February 2025. Grok-3, developed by xAI, has taken the top spot with a score of 1,402. However, it's essential to note that the results are based on unique prompts decided by users, and may not reflect the full capabilities of the models. For example, ChatGPT-4o excels in image and document analysis, has advanced vocal mode, and is better at online research. The top 10 models are: Grok-3, Gemini 2.0, ChatGPT-4o, DeepSeek R1, Qwen, Claude, Mistral, LLaMA, BERT, and PaLM. The Chatbot Arena uses a system of duels between anonymous models, with users determining the best response to a given request. The Elo system is used to evaluate the models and establish a dynamic ranking based on their performance.
Original language: fr
Publish date: February 21, 2025 09:39 AM
Source:[blogdumoderateur.com](https://www.blogdumoderateur.com/ia-modeles-plus-performants-fevrier-2025/)

**xAI's Grok 3 Model Surpasses Expectations and Tops Chatbot Leaderboard**
Elon Musk's AI company xAI has released a new model called Grok 3, which has surpassed expectations and topped the chatbot leaderboard. The model was developed using 200,000 GPUs in a custom-built data center in Tennessee, and has undergone 10 times more training than its predecessor, Grok 2. Musk said, 'I'm thrilled to announce Grok 3. I'm confident that it has significantly better capabilities than Grok 2.' The model family includes a reasoning model, Grok 3 Reasoning, which is designed to output higher-quality results by taking longer to think. All Grok 3 models are designed to compete with major models, including OpenAI's GPT-4o and Google's Gemini. In just 24 hours after its release, xAI's products have dominated the benchmarks and leaderboard. Grok 3 has already surpassed major models in several AI benchmarks, including mathematical reasoning, scientific knowledge, and coding ability. The model is still in development, but its beta version has shown comparable performance to 03-mini (high), o1, DeepSeek-R1, and Gemini-2 Flash Thinking in AIME, GPQA, and LCB. Additionally, Grok 3 has risen to the top of the Chatbot Arena rankings, outperforming Gemini, GPT-4o, and DeepSeek-R1 in all categories. xAI has also launched a new feature called DeepSearch, which allows users to ask questions and receive answers with data and tables. The company has also announced a new subscription plan called SuperGrok, which will provide access to the most advanced features for heavy users. The price of SuperGrok has not been announced, but it is expected to be significant.
Original language: ja
Publish date: February 18, 2025 11:58 PM
Source:[ZDNet Japan](https://japan.zdnet.com/article/35229553/)

**xAI Releases Grok 3 AI Model, Twitter Raises Premium+ Subscription Fee**
Elon Musk's xAI released its latest AI model, Grok 3, on February 17. As a result, Twitter (now known as X) significantly increased the subscription fee for its top-tier plan, Premium+, which allows users to access the Grok 3 model. According to X's official support page, the monthly fee for Premium+ in the US increased from $22 to $40, a 82% increase. The annual plan also increased from $299 to $395, a 32% increase. X expects to raise prices in other countries as well. Grok 3 was developed using over 10 times the computing power of its predecessor, Grok 2. It has been trained using approximately 100,000 GPUs over 214 days. xAI claims that Grok 3 outperforms GPT-4o and DeepSeek V3 in benchmarks such as AIME and GPQA. The initial version of Grok 3, 'chocolate (Early Grok-3)', is currently ranked first in the Chatbot Arena leaderboard. Grok 3 comes in several variants, including 'Grok-3 mini', 'Grok-3 Reasoning Beta', and 'Grok-3 mini Reasoning'. It can generate detailed reports by analyzing multiple information sources and combining web search and reasoning functions. Additionally, it features advanced problem-solving capabilities, such as the 'Think' function, which visualizes the reasoning process, and 'Big Brain Mode', which allocates additional computational resources to complex tasks. X Premium+ subscribers will have initial access to Grok 3, but xAI also offers a separate AI service called 'SuperGrok', which provides access to advanced features like 'Think'.
Original language: ja
Publish date: February 18, 2025 11:49 PM
Source:[マイナビニュース](https://news.mynavi.jp/article/20250219-3131627/)

**xAI's Grok 3 is better than expected. How to try it for free (before you subscribe)**
xAI's new model, Grok 3, has surpassed expectations and is dominating benchmarks and leaderboards. The model boasts 10 times more training than its predecessor, Grok 2, and has outperformed leading models on AI benchmarks, including the AIME '24, GPQA, and LCB Oct-Feb. According to Elon Musk, 'We are excited to present Grok 3, which we think is an order of magnitude more capable than Grok 2.' The model's pre-training ended in early January, and it has already climbed the charts on the Chatbot Arena, a crowdsourced platform where users can evaluate LLMs. To meet the demand for agentic capabilities, xAI also launched DeepSearch, which allows users to ask a question and receive a final, robust response with data and tables as necessary. Starting today, users can access some of the Grok models in beta, including Grok 3, by subscribing to X Premium+ for $40 per month.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 18, 2025 08:12 PM
Source:[ZDNet](https://www.zdnet.com/article/xais-grok-3-is-better-than-expected-how-to-try-it-for-free-before-you-subscribe/)

**Elon Musk just released an AI that’s smarter than ChatGPT — here’s why that matters**
Elon Musk's xAI has released Grok 3, an AI model that outperforms leading competitors across key technical benchmarks. The model has achieved superior scores in mathematics, scientific reasoning, and coding tasks, and has topped the influential Chatbot Arena leaderboard. Former OpenAI researcher Andrej Karpathy praised Grok 3's 'state of the art thinking capabilities', but noted that it sometimes fabricates citations and struggles with certain types of humor and ethical reasoning tasks. The model's development required massive computational resources, with xAI doubling its GPU cluster to 200,000 Nvidia chips. The launch intensifies competition in the AI industry, particularly as Chinese startup DeepSeek recently demonstrated comparable performance with reportedly lower computational requirements.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 18, 2025 07:51 PM
Source:[venturebeat.com](https://venturebeat.com/ai/elon-musk-just-released-an-ai-thats-smarter-than-chatgpt-heres-why-that-matters/)

**Grok 3: Elon Musk's New AI Model Promises to Revolutionize the Industry**
Elon Musk has launched his new AI model, Grok 3, which he claims is 'terrifyingly intelligent'. According to Musk, Grok 3 has 'very powerful reasoning capabilities' and has surpassed all other AI models in testing. The Chatbot Arena, a platform that compares AI systems, has ranked Grok 3 as the top AI model, surpassing Gemini, ChatGPT, and DeepSeek. Musk has stated that if everything goes as planned, Grok 3 will be integrated with his other projects, including Optimus robots and Starship rockets. Grok 3 combines known technologies, such as Tetris and Bejeweled, and offers 'unfiltered' responses, providing more realistic conversations than other AI models. However, the model is currently only available as a paid service.

**Grok-3 (codename "chocolate") is now #1 in Chatbot Arena**
xAI's Grok-3, a large language model, has secured the #1 spot in Chatbot Arena, surpassing a score of 1400 and setting a new benchmark for AI chatbots. This achievement is a testament to the incredible efforts of the xAI team, who have made breakthroughs in model architecture, training efficiency, and computational infrastructure. Elon Musk described Grok-3 as 'an order of magnitude more capable than Grok-2 in a very short period of time.' The model's success is attributed to xAI's custom-built AI supercomputer, which was constructed at an unprecedented pace. Grok-3 introduces new reasoning capabilities, which are still undergoing active development, and has demonstrated superior generalization ability in initial tests. xAI is expanding into AI-driven gaming and has launched an AI gaming studio, with Elon Musk hinting at future collaborations and innovations.
Original language: en
Publish date: February 18, 2025 05:58 AM
Source:[Analytics Vidhya](https://www.analyticsvidhya.com/blog/2025/02/grok-3-is-now-1-in-chatbot-arena/)

**OpenAI's GPT-4.5 Nears Release, While xAI's Grok 3 Aims to be 'Earth's Smartest AI'**
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has proposed a new open-source project, asking whether to develop a small-scale model that requires a GPU or a more suitable model for mobile devices. The current vote is heavily in favor of the former. Altman has previously acknowledged that OpenAI has been 'on the wrong side of history' in open-source AI software. He also expressed that GPT-4.5 has exceeded his expectations in providing an AGI-like experience for high-demand testers. This suggests that GPT-4.5 is nearing its official release. Meanwhile, Elon Musk announced that Grok 3 will be released on February 18 at 8pm PST (February 19, 12pm Beijing time), with a live demonstration. Musk claims that Grok 3 will be the 'smartest AI on Earth.' According to the Chatbot Arena rankings, Grok 2 is currently ranked 18th globally, behind models like Gemini 2.0 and ChatGPT-4o. Musk has expressed confidence in Grok 3, stating that it has surpassed all published models and has even been 'terrifying' in its capabilities. Additionally, xAI is reportedly seeking to raise $100 billion in funding, which could value the company at $750 billion. Existing investors, including Sequoia Capital and Andreessen Horowitz, are in talks to participate in this round of funding.
Original language: zh
Publish date: February 18, 2025 04:31 AM
Source:[每日经济新闻](https://www.nbd.com.cn/articles/2025-02-18/3755334.html)

**Grok 3 Surpasses Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking in Chatbot Arena Rankings**
xAI has announced the new model Grok 3, which has been shown to be superior to its competitors in benchmark tests. Chatbot Arena has confirmed this, placing Grok 3 at the top of the rankings. Grok 3 surpasses Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking, a model developed by Google, with a score of over 1,400 points. This is a significant achievement, especially considering that Grok 3 is a preliminary version. The model also excels in categories such as creative writing, mathematical problem-solving, and code writing, as shown on X. The Grok 3 family consists of four models: Grok 3, Grok 3 mini, Grok 3 Reasoning, and Grok 3 mini Reasoning. The latter two models are competitors to OpenAI's o3 and DeepSeek R1. Grok 3 Reasoning surpasses o3 mini in almost all benchmarks. X Premium+ subscribers (22.27 euros/month in Italy) can access Grok 3 and its advanced features, including 'deep search' and 'research' capabilities, in advance. xAI has also introduced a new subscription called SuperGrok, which provides access to Grok 3's advanced features, DeepSearch queries, and unlimited image generation. The price has not been disclosed, but it is rumored to be $30/month.

**Aliyun's Qwen 2.5-Max Model Tops Global AI Large Model Leaderboard**
Aliyun announced that its Qwen 2.5-Max model has topped the latest AI large model leaderboard, Chatbot Arena, with a score of 1332, ranking seventh globally. In addition, Qwen2.5-Max ranked first in mathematics and programming, and second in hard prompts. Aliyun stated that Qwen2.5-Max performed well in various benchmark tests, including Arena-Hard, LiveBench, LiveCodeBench, GPQA-Diamond, and MMLU-Pro, surpassing GPT-4o, DeepSeek-V3, and Llama-3.1-405B. 'Qwen2.5-Max is a non-reasoning Chinese large model champion,' said Aliyun. 'It has surpassed DeepSeek V3, Open AI o1-mini, and Claude-3.5-Sonnet in Chatbot Arena.' 
Original language: zh

Source:[凤凰网（凤凰新媒体）](https://tech.ifeng.com/c/8gjLlvGftJl)

**Qwen2.5-Max: A New Global Model Leaderboard Champion**
Aliyun's Qwen2.5-Max has topped the global model leaderboard, surpassing DeepSeek V3, o1-mini, and Claude-3.5-Sonnet, with a score of 1332, ranking 7th globally. Qwen2.5-Max also ranked 1st in math and programming, and 2nd in hard prompts. The model has shown excellent comprehensive performance in various benchmark tests, including Arena-Hard, LiveBench, LiveCodeBench, GPQA-Diamond, and MMLU-Pro. ChatBot Arena officials praised Qwen2.5-Max's strong performance in multiple fields, particularly in professional technical areas such as programming, math, and difficult prompts. 'With Qwen2.5-max, we can say goodbye to ChatGPT?' said a user in Arabic. Many overseas users expressed their amazement at Qwen2.5-max's extreme performance. The Aliyun team is confident in the next version of Qwen2.5-Max and will continue to explore, focusing on scaling up pre-training and reinforcement learning to achieve human-level intelligence and drive AI exploration of the unknown.

summary: In Phase 1, the experts estimated low initial probabilities for a Grok model to reach the #1 position on the Chatbot Arena Leaderboard by the end of the first quarter of 2025, with estimates ranging from 10% to 30%. This cautious outlook was based on historical patterns showing that moving from a lower ranking to the top spot in a short period is uncommon, despite the rapid advancements in AI technology and the competitive nature of the field. However, in Phase 2, news reports indicated that Grok-3 achieved the #1 spot on the leaderboard as of February 2025, demonstrating significant advancements and performance improvements. This evidence led to an increase in the revised probabilities, with experts raising their estimates to between 15% and 60%, reflecting optimism about Grok-3's ability to maintain its top position despite strong competition from new models like Google's Gemma 3 and OpenAI's GPT-4.5. Overall, the final consensus suggests a moderate to high likelihood of Grok models being ranked #1 at the end of Q1 2025, with revised probabilities reflecting this shift in outlook.
